Reviews.Title: tv buyer
Reviews.Author: Ms. Bridget L. Robinson
Reviews.Content: Bought TV priced on sale at almost half the price of similar TVs.The TV looks like its all screen with almost no edge around it.It has a separate  keyboard and remote for connecting tointernet, it has its own TV guide which comes in handy for nonsatellite/cable users.The 2D/HD is like watching 3D and watching the life of pi 3D is like being a part of the movie the colors are amazing.  Updating from a 42 inch sharp aquosWill update after more use.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Mel BYARS
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV. I probably should have purchase two larger ones, but this one serves well. The image is clear, and the frame is super-thin.

Reviews.Title: broke already
Reviews.Author: Carly L..
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv only 3 months ago and the picture is already gone. Waiting for the warranty department to send out a technician. I paid a hefty sum for this unit and did not expect issues within the first year. very disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
1080p Full HD - Get the highest level of HD picture quality available today.
ClearScan 240Hz - Get awesome, crisp images for quick-action sports and other fast-motion video.
3D Natural (Passive) - Ideal for families and gamers who want to enjoy in-your-face action, eye-popping movies and games in 3D.
Smart TV - Enhances your television experience by tying into the web, your mobile devices, even other electronics in your home to expand what you can do and enjoy.
Audyssey Premium Television - A suite of advanced audio technologies that include Audyssey EQ and Audyssey ABX.
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba 47L7200U 47" Class 1080P 240Hz 3D LED HD TV
